charges.charge_description: 18:922(g); 924(a)(2) TRANSPORT FIREARMS INTERSTATE BY FELON-having previously been convicted of a crime punishable by imprisonment for a term exceeding one year, did knowingly possess, in and affecting commerce, a firearm (4)

charges.charge_disposition: JUDGMENT FILED 10/29/99 IN THE EASTERN DISTRICT OF TEXAS: Defendant is hereby committed to the custody of the Bureau of Prisons for 37 months. The Court recommends the 500 hour residential drug treatment program. The Defendant shall surrender for service of sentence before 2:00pm on Upon release from imprisonment, defendant shall be on supervised release for 2 years with standard and special conditions. Defendant is to pay a special assessment of $100.00 in full immediately (4)
